theTeam.name: Ethan C.
theTeam.introduction: Ethan is a high school student who is passionate about astronomy and astrophysics. He is always looking for new ways to learn and explore the universe. Ethan is a dedicated student who is committed to making a positive impact on the world through his passion for astronomy.

hero.title: Welcome to AstroGaels
hero.subtitle: A club for astronomy and astrophysics enthusiasts
hero.buttonText: Start Your Journey with Us Today

testimonials.quote: The astrogaels transformed my understanding of astronomy!
testimonials.author: Alex S.

testimonials.quote: The community here is incredibly supportive and knowledgeable.
testimonials.author: Jamie L.

testimonials.quote: I never thought learning could be this engaging and fun!
testimonials.author: Sam T.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: AstroGaels is dedicated to fostering a passion for astronomy and space exploration among students. We aim to provide a platform for learning, discovery, and collaboration in the field of astronomy.

features.title: Stargazing Sessions
features.description: Regular nighttime observations of celestial objects.

features.title: Community
features.description: A supportive network of astronomy enthusiasts.

features.title: Education
features.description: Workshops, lectures, and hands-on learning experiences.

features.title: Events
features.description: Exciting astronomy-related events throughout the year.

history.heading: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2022 by a group of passionate astronomy students, AstroGaels has grown from a small club into a thriving community of space enthusiasts. Over the years, we've organized countless stargazing sessions, hosted renowned guest speakers, and even contributed to real astronomical research projects. Our commitment to spreading the wonder of the cosmos remains as strong as ever.

join.heading: Join AstroGaels Today
join.description: Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or just starting to explore the night sky, there's a place for you in AstroGaels. Join us in our mission to unravel the mysteries of the universe!

classes.title: Introduction to Astronomy
classes.description: Learn the basics of astronomy and our solar system.

classes.title: Exploring Black Holes
classes.description: Dive into the mysterious world of black holes.
